fields_of_interest: Economy, finance and the euro, Competition, Energy, Business and Industry, Environment, Single market, Research and innovation, Climate Action
eu_initiatives: Construction Product Regulations, REACH, Regulated Dangerous Substances, Construction Products in Contact with Drinking Water, Harmonised European Standards (CEN), Joint Initiative on Standardisation
organisation_name: European Federation of Concrete Admixtures Associations Limited (EFCA)
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
membership:
Cembureau 
European Concrete Platform 
Construction Products Europe 
European Chemicals Agency 
European Ready Mixed Concrete Organisation 
BIBM - European Federation for Precast Concrete 
INGRESS - Industry Group on European Standardisation Strategy
relevant_communication:
Members reports, newsletters available on EFCA website at http://www.efca.info.  
Support for the "Common Expression of Interest from Construction Product Manufacturers on Annex VIII to the CLP1 on harmonised information relating to emergency health response"
goals__remit:
To act as the official representative of the European concrete admixture industry when approaching authorities, institutions or other competent bodies at European and International level. 
 
To coordinate the activities of National Admixture Associations where these relate to European or International matters. 
 
To improve the technical and environmental profile of the industry including development of European Standards prepared under the aegis of CEN.  
 
To work cloesly with other European organisataions in the field of concrete, constituents and supply,in ordere to promote the use of concrete.  
 
To collect and dissseminate information and market surveillance on matters related to admixtures and concrete to the advantage of EFCA partners.
